text:
Threatened Species Protection Order 2022

I make the following order under section 13(5) of the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 .

5 December 2022

R. C. JAENSCH

Minister for Environment and Climate Change

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Threatened Species Protection Order 2022 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 .

6.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 December 2022

This order is administered in the Department of Natural Resources and Environment Tasmania.
